I-S-C Home
The Main Page.

Antuuk posted this information on the forum.

Warping as a gang, if done properly, reduces the time it takes for the gang to travel from point A to point B.

1. Line your ship up on the yellow gate in the space field by double clicking just below it.

2. Once your ship reaches three quarters of full speed, inform your Squadron Leader that you are ready to warp.

3. Gang leader warps gang to next jumpgate. As all members at this point, should be close to full speed, all the gang members warp simultaneously.

4. Upon arriving at the next gate, await the command to jump from your Sqn Ldr.

5. Last man through the gate should be the Sqn 2 I/C (2nd In Command)

6. Sqn 2 I/C informs Sqn Ldr that all ships are through once he has jumped himself.

7. Repeat step 1.

Squadron Leaders should practice this with their squadrons until all members are familiar with the drill. This will dramatically reduce the time it takes to travel anywhere!
